phase_summary: Identified faulty GREEN phase implementation using in-memory storage instead of ObjectBox. Need to restart RED phase with authentic TDD methodology: remove in-memory workaround, add ObjectBox dependency, create failing tests.
restart_reason: Found ObjectBoxSemanticIndex.swift using in-memory Dictionary storage instead of actual ObjectBox vector database. This violates authentic TDD principles. Need to remove workaround and implement proper failing tests with ObjectBox dependency.
